blog.name: summersmiledagain
blog.title: Miscellaneous Ramblings
blog.description: Hello, hello!  You can call me Grace.  I'm a Christian girl who is obsessed with way too many fandoms.  There's a lot of Broadway and Marvel on this blog, but you'll see other fandom-related content scattered in there, too!  I'm also a crazy cat lady so you'll probably see some adorable kitten posts on my blog.  Sideblogs: abundantlygraced (my life with chronic fatigue + adhd + anxiety) // a-narnia-lullaby (where I obsess over soundtracks) // jediofthestars (where I obsess over Star Wars)

summary: You wanna know how I know that all the characters that died in Infinity War aren’t going to stay dead?  Because I did not suffer...
body:
You wanna know how I know that all the characters that died in Infinity War aren’t going to stay dead?  Because I did not suffer through TFA, TWS, and CACW only to have Bucky and Steve speak five lines to each other and then Bucky die.  Nope.  That, Marvel, is not allowed.  Bucky is finally recovering and doing better, and he and Steve need to get to be friends again and have some happiness before anything happens to them.  So yeah, I know Bucky and the others are gonna be coming back to life.

And if I’m the only one, then so be it.  But I’m willing to bet I’m not.

tags: could it turn out entirely differently?
summary: We all know that Tony was pissed when he found out that Steve knew that HYDRA killed his parents and then a lot of people seemed...
body: We all know that Tony was pissed when he found out that Steve knew that HYDRA killed his parents and then a lot of people seemed to forget that Natasha also knew, but I just realised that the only way that Tony could know that Natasha knew is if Steve told him. What if Steve just never does that because he doesn’t want Tony to lose faith in another team mate the way he lost faith in him? What if it comes out someday that Natasha knows? Will Tony be pissed at her? Will he be pissed at Steve for not telling him something else? Will he realise that Steve was trying to protect him? Will it be all three?

Hey, welcome to my blog! I write imagines and ships, make mood boards and social media imagines. Send me requests for any of the things listed in my 'Themes'.

All requests are open :)

title: Tony’s Daughter - Part 5
body:
Summary: Tony Stark had a secret daughter, one which he had hidden from the world due to her supernatural abilities. When she turned 20, she begged her father to let her join the Avengers. Little did he know that, in agreeing to this, he was introducing her to the man she would grow to love.

Part 1, Part 2, Part 3, Part 4, Part 6, Part 7 (End)

(Steve Rogers x Reader, Tony Stark (Dad) x Reader)

Warnings: Mild violence

Word Count: 1,168

Requested by: @xxchloegrayxx

She’d been missing for days. Steve was driving himself insane searching for her. There were no clues as to where she could have gone and her phone had been left in her room, so there was no way to contact her. Tony was still in hospital, in and out of consciousness. His injuries had been worse than they’d originally thought. Pepper spent most of the time by his bed-side. He was unaware of his daughter’s disappearance, as the Pepper worried it would make him worse.

It had now been exactly 5 days since (Y/N) was last seen. Steve, Wanda, Vision and the other Avengers sat in the meeting room. “Anything yet, my love?” Vision asked. Wanda had been trying to sense (Y/N) ever since Steve found her bedroom to be empty. The woman shook her head, sighing. “I can’t feel anything. I don’t know what’s going on. It’s so frustrating.” Her hands balled into fists and red sparks began to fly.  

“Don’t strain yourself, love,” Vision took Wanda’s hand and her palms ceased glowing.

“Could… Could that mean she’s…?” Steve’s voice choked before he could finish his sentence.

“Don’t lose hope, Cap,” Peter comforted.

“The boy is right. I’m sure there’s a perfectly reasonable explanation,” Thor chimed in.  

“Might I make a suggestion?” Everyone jumped as Loki appeared from thin air.

“I guess anything could help right now,” Steve motioned for Loki to continue.

“Could Miss (Y/N) be with your soldier friend?” Loki asked. The room was quiet for a moment, everyone thinking over what had just been said. “What makes you say that, brother?” Thor questioned. “Well, this man wants to take us down, right? (Y/N) is a weakness for at least two members of this “team”,” Loki avoided the word ‘Avengers’, “So surely the best way for him to get to us would be to kidnap the one person we are all here to protect. No offence, but she’s our weak-link, so far easier to capture than say myself, for example.”

Ignoring his clear sarcasm and ego boost, Vision said, “He makes a valid point.”

“It would fit with why I can’t sense her. I imagine wherever she has been taken is heavily warded, especially if it’s run by Hydra, as we’ve guessed,” Wanda mused.

Steve shuddered at the thought of his girl under Hydra’s hypnosis. His best friend and girlfriend had been brainwashed into wanting to kill him. The situation was not ideal. “If you’re right and she is with him, then we can’t waste any time. If Hydra instructs (Y/N) to kill someone and she follows those orders, she’ll never recover. The guilt will be too much for her,” Steve rubbed his temples, the concern in his voice was evident. His lips were drawn into a thin line. The stress of the past week had taken its toll on his appearance, as his cheeks had grown hollow and his skin a deathly shade of white. Eating had become pretty much impossible and training was out of the question. Without (Y/N) and Bucky, he was lost. (Y/N) had helped heal at least some of the damage left by the loss of Bucky. But now that both of them were just out of Steve’s reach, it was torture.

“We can’t tell Stark,” Clint said, “He needs to recover.”

“Cap, are you okay to head this mission?” Natasha asked, “We need a leader.”

Steve nodded, “I could be the only one who can break the hypnosis.”

Bruce rang Pepper to fill her in on the updated plan. “Thank you, Mrs Stark… Yes, that will be helpful… I’ll see you soon… That’s such good news… Thank you… Okay, bye.” He hung up and was met with Steve’s curious stare. “Pepper says she has something the will help us find (Y/N).”

~

“What’s that?”

“Tony gave (Y/N) and I matching necklaces when (Y/N) turned 16. Not long after, I discovered they were more than just gifts,” Pepper unclipped the necklace and opened the heart-shaped locket. There were no photographs inside, only a small black dot, which flashed green every few seconds.

“A tracker,” Steve breathed. This was what they had been looking for, the exact breakthrough they needed for the next step in saving (Y/N) and Bucky.

“But what if the wards stop the signal?” Wanda asked.

Pepper shrugged, “It’s worth a shot.” She produced a laptop from her bag, set it on the table and started it up. “All I have to do is type in her date of birth and it’ll find her,” she paused, “hopefully.” Steve patted her shoulder and she gave him a sympathetic smile.

After a few minutes of staring at a blank screen, the laptop sprung into life. It began beeping wildly, a red dot flashing. A map formed itself around the dot and coordinates appeared. “Bingo,” Pepper whispered.

“Let’s go get them,” Steve smiled. He was beginning to gain hope again. This was a step in the right direction, however the hard part was yet to come.

Pepper decided it was best if she stayed at Tony’s side. If he woke up and was alone, with only doctors around him, he’d panic. She’d rather give him hear the news from her than from the mouth of a stranger. “We’ll call you as soon as there’s anything to tell,” Bruce told Pepper. She gave her gratitude and left to care for her husband.

~

It wasn’t difficult to find. The facility was actually rather obvious. It stuck out like a sore thumb amongst the trees. The tricky bit would be getting inside.

“There are guards at every entry point,” Clint muttered, “Nat and I can take out most of them, but we’ll need back up.”

“I believe brother and I could assist in that field,” Loki offered.

“And maybe the doctor’s green friend would like to make an appearance?” Thor asked. Bruce shuddered a little, looking to Steve for support.

“Perhaps Hulk should stay away for this part,” Steve said, and Bruce let out a shaky breath, “We don’t want to cause to much of a scene.” The group nodded in agreement.

“So, Loki and Thor take the left half of the building, Nat and Clint take the right. Banner, Vision, Wanda and Pete, you’re my back-up,” Steve instructed, “Good luck, everyone.”

~

The room was pitch black. (Y/N) squinted, trying to make out something in this unfamiliar environment. “Ah good,” A deep voice startled her, “You’re awake.” It sounded like this stranger was mocking her. “You’re from Hydra,” (Y/N) said. It was a statement, not a question.

The voice chuckled, “I’d almost forgotten about those powers of yours. They could come in handy.”

She never saw the man, but knew what was coming. “Yes,” he hissed, “You’ll be very useful.”

He never spoke again, but (Y/N) knew he was still there. She could hear exactly what he was thinking. A needle jabbed into her neck, but she wasn’t frightened. She knew Steve would come looking for her. She knew about the tracker.

Tag List:  @edwisenpai @chibiyanai @alphaaddict @this-is-happening @alkimara @stupidlysarcastic @mikariell95 @rubygalaxyvh

It wasn’t difficult to find. The facility was actually rather obvious. It stuck out like a sore thumb amongst the trees. The tricky bit would be getting inside.

“There are guards at every entry point,” Clint muttered, “Nat and I can take out most of them, but we’ll need back up.”

“I believe brother and I could assist in that field,” Loki offered.

“And maybe the doctor’s green friend would like to make an appearance?” Thor asked. Bruce shuddered a little, looking to Steve for support.

“Perhaps Hulk should stay away for this part,” Steve said, and Bruce let out a shaky breath, “We don’t want to cause to much of a scene.” The group nodded in agreement.

“So, Loki and Thor take the left half of the building, Nat and Clint take the right. Banner, Vision, Wanda and Pete, you’re my back-up,” Steve instructed, “Good luck, everyone.”

~

The room was pitch black. (Y/N) squinted, trying to make out something in this unfamiliar environment. “Ah good,” A deep voice startled her, “You’re awake.” It sounded like this stranger was mocking her. “You’re from Hydra,” (Y/N) said. It was a statement, not a question.

The voice chuckled, “I’d almost forgotten about those powers of yours. They could come in handy.”

She never saw the man, but knew what was coming. “Yes,” he hissed, “You’ll be very useful.”

He never spoke again, but (Y/N) knew he was still there. She could hear exactly what he was thinking. A needle jabbed into her neck, but she wasn’t frightened. She knew Steve would come looking for her. She knew about the tracker.

Tag List:  @edwisenpai @chibiyanai @alphaaddict @this-is-happening @alkimara @stupidlysarcastic @mikariell95 @rubygalaxyvh
trail.content:
Summary: Tony Stark had a secret daughter, one which he had hidden from the world due to her supernatural abilities. When she turned 20, she begged her father to let her join the Avengers. Little did he know that, in agreeing to this, he was introducing her to the man she would grow to love.

Part 1, Part 2, Part 3, Part 4, Part 6, Part 7 (End)

(Steve Rogers x Reader, Tony Stark (Dad) x Reader)

Warnings: Mild violence

Word Count: 1,168

Requested by: @xxchloegrayxx

She’d been missing for days. Steve was driving himself insane searching for her. There were no clues as to where she could have gone and her phone had been left in her room, so there was no way to contact her. Tony was still in hospital, in and out of consciousness. His injuries had been worse than they’d originally thought. Pepper spent most of the time by his bed-side. He was unaware of his daughter’s disappearance, as the Pepper worried it would make him worse.

It had now been exactly 5 days since (Y/N) was last seen. Steve, Wanda, Vision and the other Avengers sat in the meeting room. “Anything yet, my love?” Vision asked. Wanda had been trying to sense (Y/N) ever since Steve found her bedroom to be empty. The woman shook her head, sighing. “I can’t feel anything. I don’t know what’s going on. It’s so frustrating.” Her hands balled into fists and red sparks began to fly.  

“Don’t strain yourself, love,” Vision took Wanda’s hand and her palms ceased glowing.

“Could… Could that mean she’s…?” Steve’s voice choked before he could finish his sentence.

“Don’t lose hope, Cap,” Peter comforted.

“The boy is right. I’m sure there’s a perfectly reasonable explanation,” Thor chimed in.  

“Might I make a suggestion?” Everyone jumped as Loki appeared from thin air.

“I guess anything could help right now,” Steve motioned for Loki to continue.

“Could Miss (Y/N) be with your soldier friend?” Loki asked. The room was quiet for a moment, everyone thinking over what had just been said. “What makes you say that, brother?” Thor questioned. “Well, this man wants to take us down, right? (Y/N) is a weakness for at least two members of this “team”,” Loki avoided the word ‘Avengers’, “So surely the best way for him to get to us would be to kidnap the one person we are all here to protect. No offence, but she’s our weak-link, so far easier to capture than say myself, for example.”

Ignoring his clear sarcasm and ego boost, Vision said, “He makes a valid point.”

“It would fit with why I can’t sense her. I imagine wherever she has been taken is heavily warded, especially if it’s run by Hydra, as we’ve guessed,” Wanda mused.

Steve shuddered at the thought of his girl under Hydra’s hypnosis. His best friend and girlfriend had been brainwashed into wanting to kill him. The situation was not ideal. “If you’re right and she is with him, then we can’t waste any time. If Hydra instructs (Y/N) to kill someone and she follows those orders, she’ll never recover. The guilt will be too much for her,” Steve rubbed his temples, the concern in his voice was evident. His lips were drawn into a thin line. The stress of the past week had taken its toll on his appearance, as his cheeks had grown hollow and his skin a deathly shade of white. Eating had become pretty much impossible and training was out of the question. Without (Y/N) and Bucky, he was lost. (Y/N) had helped heal at least some of the damage left by the loss of Bucky. But now that both of them were just out of Steve’s reach, it was torture.

“We can’t tell Stark,” Clint said, “He needs to recover.”

“Cap, are you okay to head this mission?” Natasha asked, “We need a leader.”

Steve nodded, “I could be the only one who can break the hypnosis.”

Bruce rang Pepper to fill her in on the updated plan. “Thank you, Mrs Stark… Yes, that will be helpful… I’ll see you soon… That’s such good news… Thank you… Okay, bye.” He hung up and was met with Steve’s curious stare. “Pepper says she has something the will help us find (Y/N).”

~

“What’s that?”

“Tony gave (Y/N) and I matching necklaces when (Y/N) turned 16. Not long after, I discovered they were more than just gifts,” Pepper unclipped the necklace and opened the heart-shaped locket. There were no photographs inside, only a small black dot, which flashed green every few seconds.

“A tracker,” Steve breathed. This was what they had been looking for, the exact breakthrough they needed for the next step in saving (Y/N) and Bucky.

“But what if the wards stop the signal?” Wanda asked.

Pepper shrugged, “It’s worth a shot.” She produced a laptop from her bag, set it on the table and started it up. “All I have to do is type in her date of birth and it’ll find her,” she paused, “hopefully.” Steve patted her shoulder and she gave him a sympathetic smile.

After a few minutes of staring at a blank screen, the laptop sprung into life. It began beeping wildly, a red dot flashing. A map formed itself around the dot and coordinates appeared. “Bingo,” Pepper whispered.

“Let’s go get them,” Steve smiled. He was beginning to gain hope again. This was a step in the right direction, however the hard part was yet to come.

Pepper decided it was best if she stayed at Tony’s side. If he woke up and was alone, with only doctors around him, he’d panic. She’d rather give him hear the news from her than from the mouth of a stranger. “We’ll call you as soon as there’s anything to tell,” Bruce told Pepper. She gave her gratitude and left to care for her husband.

~

It wasn’t difficult to find. The facility was actually rather obvious. It stuck out like a sore thumb amongst the trees. The tricky bit would be getting inside.

“There are guards at every entry point,” Clint muttered, “Nat and I can take out most of them, but we’ll need back up.”

“I believe brother and I could assist in that field,” Loki offered.

“And maybe the doctor’s green friend would like to make an appearance?” Thor asked. Bruce shuddered a little, looking to Steve for support.

“Perhaps Hulk should stay away for this part,” Steve said, and Bruce let out a shaky breath, “We don’t want to cause to much of a scene.” The group nodded in agreement.

“So, Loki and Thor take the left half of the building, Nat and Clint take the right. Banner, Vision, Wanda and Pete, you’re my back-up,” Steve instructed, “Good luck, everyone.”

~

The room was pitch black. (Y/N) squinted, trying to make out something in this unfamiliar environment. “Ah good,” A deep voice startled her, “You’re awake.” It sounded like this stranger was mocking her. “You’re from Hydra,” (Y/N) said. It was a statement, not a question.

The voice chuckled, “I’d almost forgotten about those powers of yours. They could come in handy.”

She never saw the man, but knew what was coming. “Yes,” he hissed, “You’ll be very useful.”

He never spoke again, but (Y/N) knew he was still there. She could hear exactly what he was thinking. A needle jabbed into her neck, but she wasn’t frightened. She knew Steve would come looking for her. She knew about the tracker.

Tag List:  @edwisenpai @chibiyanai @alphaaddict @this-is-happening @alkimara @stupidlysarcastic @mikariell95 @rubygalaxyvh

MASTERLIST

body:
Update

Heyy :)

Just a little update post about the fics I’m currently in. The one called “Rio pra não chorar” is at the end. I will probably write the finale soon.

Regarding the one-shots of Rule nr 1 : 

I still have a couple ideas that are the following ones : 

  • First time meeting Deadpool
  • Chapters involving Louisa (the reader and Loki’s child)
  • Meeting Daisy Johnson & Coulson
  • Guardians of the Galaxy
  • First time seeing Maya (Fury’s niece)
  • Maybe chapters focusing on characters I haven’t explored yet (Natasha, Clint, Sam, Shuri, T’Challa, Dr Strange…)

If you have a particular idea that you would like me to ad or write as a one-shot, just comment under this post or send an ask, as you feel more comfortable and I can see how to incorporate it. 🙂

Have a nice day ❤️
